_documentation.description: Configuration data for the Strive Dungeon Generator. This file can be loaded into the generator to customize dungeon generation.

general: All arrays use simple string values unless otherwise specified
When adding new entries, maintain consistent style with existing entries
Ensure all strings are properly quoted and arrays end with the last element (no trailing comma)
Test changes by loading this file into the generator
formatNotes.roomTypes: Simple noun phrases for room names (e.g., 'chamber', 'vault'). Used in descriptions like 'a dusty [roomType]'.
formatNotes.leadIns: Opening phrases for room descriptions. Should work grammatically before a room type (e.g., 'You enter a...').
formatNotes.sensesUnderfoot: Descriptions of what the floor feels like underfoot. Should be complete clauses that can follow 'where'.
formatNotes.sensesAir: Descriptions of air quality/smell. Should be complete clauses.
formatNotes.sensesSound: Descriptions of ambient sounds. Should be complete clauses.
formatNotes.sensesLight: Descriptions of lighting conditions. Should be complete clauses.
formatNotes.interactions: Verb phrases describing how anchor features appear (e.g., 'crumbling with age'). Used after anchor features.
formatNotes.anchorFeatures: Major objects/features in rooms. Should start with 'A/An' or 'The' or be plural nouns.
formatNotes.environmentalThreatChance: Chance (0-1) that a room contains an environmental hazard in addition to normal threats.
formatNotes.environmentalThreats: List of environmental hazards. Each entry should include a name, description, and optional check (e.g., 'Effective Body'). If no check is provided, defeat/overwhelm tiers are used.
formatNotes.pressures: Environmental dangers or tension-building descriptions. Complete sentences.
formatNotes.mitigations: Actions players can take to address pressures. Verb phrases that follow 'A successful check could...'.
formatNotes.doorStatuses: States a door can be in. 'Open' means no check needed; others require bypass checks.
formatNotes.doorBypassVerbs: Object mapping door statuses to bypass options. Each status has an array of 'verbs' (action words for bypassing). The stat used is determined contextually in-game.
formatNotes.typeWords: Enemy type classifications. Each maps to an ability in wordToAbility and a range in typeRange.
formatNotes.wordToAbility: Maps typeWords to their special abilities. Format: 'AbilityName: Full description of what the ability does.'
formatNotes.typeRange: Maps typeWords to their attack range. Values: 'Melee', 'Ranged', 'Melee and Ranged', or an array for random selection.
formatNotes.striveAbilities: Master list of all Strive TTRPG abilities. Format: 'AbilityName: Full rules description.' Used for keyword abilities.
formatNotes.keywordAbilityInputMax: Maximum number of custom abilities per keyword when setting up a dungeon.
formatNotes.difficultyProfiles: Object with 'Easy', 'Medium', 'Hard', 'Deadly' keys. Each profile controls enemy stats, quantities, and challenge scaling.

difficultyProfileFields.potencyWeights: Weighted chances for Competent/Effective/Forceful potency levels (should sum to 100)
difficultyProfileFields.successTiers: Success thresholds for defeating (defeat) and overwhelming (overwhelm) enemies
difficultyProfileFields.successTiersWeak: Optional weaker tiers for Hard/Deadly difficulty variation
difficultyProfileFields.threatTypesRange: Min/max different enemy types per room
difficultyProfileFields.maxThreatsPerRoom: Hard cap on total enemies in one room
difficultyProfileFields.keywordAbilityChance: Probability (0-1) that an enemy gets a keyword ability
difficultyProfileFields.bossDefeatBonus: Extra successes needed to defeat a boss
difficultyProfileFields.bossOverwhelmBonus: Extra successes needed to overwhelm a boss

formatNotes.lootData: Loot tables for magic, mundane gear, and curios by rarity or category.
formatNotes.lootRarityWeights: Weighted chances for magic item rarity by difficulty (should sum to 100).
formatNotes.lootRevealThresholdRange: Min/max success thresholds required to reveal loot tiers.
formatNotes.lootRevealTiers: Reveal order and required successes for loot tiers (coins, curios, magic, etc.).
formatNotes.layouts: Maps layout categories (Rooms, Halls, Dead Ends) to arrays of layout IDs. IDs reference PNG files in layouts/ folder.
formatNotes.entranceLayouts: Special entrance room layouts. Maps layout ID to array of exit directions (N/E/S/W).
formatNotes.layoutExits: Maps layout code prefixes to their exit directions. Code is extracted from layout ID (e.g., 'NE1' -> 'NE' -> ['N', 'E']).

addingNewEntries.arrays: Simply add new string entries to the end of the array, before the closing bracket. Ensure comma after previous entry.
addingNewEntries.typeWords: When adding a new type: 1) Add to typeWords array, 2) Add corresponding entry in wordToAbility, 3) Add range in typeRange.
addingNewEntries.striveAbilities: Format must be 'AbilityName: Description'. The colon separator is required for parsing.
addingNewEntries.difficultyProfiles: Copy an existing profile and adjust values. All fields are required.
addingNewEntries.lootData: Add loot items to the relevant tier/category arrays to expand loot generation.
addingNewEntries.layouts: Add new layout ID to appropriate category. Ensure matching PNG exists in layouts/ folder with matching filename.

sensesUnderfoot: the ground is damp and uneven
slick stone bites at your boots
sensesAir: the air is cool and mineral-rich
a wet chill clings to every breath
sensesSound: water drips in distant echoes
pebbles skitter under unseen movement
sensesLight: your light fractures on glittering walls
darkness pools in jagged seams

sensesUnderfoot: the floor is worn smooth by chains
dust gathers in cold stone grooves
sensesAir: stale air tastes of iron and soot
a dry draft carries old smoke
sensesSound: metal groans with every shift
somewhere a door rattles in its frame
sensesLight: torchlight throws harsh bars across the walls
the room sits in hard, unforgiving shadows

sensesUnderfoot: a thin rime cracks beneath each step
your boots scrape across frozen stone
sensesAir: frost fogs every breath
the air bites at exposed skin
sensesSound: ice creaks in slow, steady rhythms
silence rings with crystalline sharpness
sensesLight: pale light glints off frosted surfaces
a wan glow makes the cold feel deeper

sensesUnderfoot: the stone radiates heat
embers crunch underfoot
sensesAir: the air shimmers with oppressive warmth
smoke and ash sting your throat
sensesSound: metal pops as it cools
a low rumble vibrates through the floor
sensesLight: a furnace glow washes everything in amber
heat haze distorts the edges of your light

sensesUnderfoot: the floor disappears beneath murky water
slippery algae coats every step
sensesAir: a damp, briny smell hangs heavy
mold and moisture cling to the air
sensesSound: water ripples with every movement
a distant trickle keeps time
sensesLight: reflections dance across the ceiling
your light fractures on the water's surface

sensesUnderfoot: dust rises in slow swirls
timeworn tiles shift underfoot
sensesAir: the air tastes of dry parchment and age
a faint scent of old incense lingers
sensesSound: your steps echo like distant bells
silence settles with ceremonial weight
sensesLight: dim light reveals faded murals
long shadows drape the relics
interactions: crumbling under the weight of ages

sensesUnderfoot: sludge pulls at your boots
grates rattle under slick grime
sensesAir: the air is thick with rot
noxious fumes burn your lungs
sensesSound: water gurgles through pipes
rats skitter in the dark
sensesLight: your light struggles against oily mist
murk swallows every glow

sensesUnderfoot: runes pulse faintly beneath your feet
the floor vibrates with latent power
sensesAir: ozone and incense mingle in the air
magic prickles along your skin
sensesSound: arcane energy crackles softly
glassware chimes with unseen force
sensesLight: glowing sigils paint the walls
your shadow warps as light bends

sensesUnderfoot: the floor feels tacky and wrong
splinters crunch in a dark residue
sensesAir: the air is stale and breathless
a coppery tang lingers in your throat
sensesSound: something scrapes just out of sight
your heartbeat sounds too loud
sensesLight: shadows cling to every corner
your light seems to dim in fear

leadIns: At the end of the passage is
sensesUnderfoot: cracked flagstones shift beneath your feet
soft earth muffles your steps
bones crunch underfoot
slick moss covers the floor
loose gravel scatters with each step
ancient tiles lie broken and uneven
thick dust coats every surface
shallow water pools on the floor
dried leaves crackle beneath you
rough-hewn stone chills your soles
worn steps dip in the centre from countless crossings
fine ash smears into grey prints behind you
sticky resin clings to your soles
shards of ceramic crunch and skitter
old straw and mouldy reeds squash underfoot
salt crust cracks like thin ice
tar-like seepage makes each step tug
cinders pop softly as you tread
iron filings glitter in the grit
wet clay sucks at your boots
oil-slick puddles rainbow in your light
chalky powder coats the stone and puffs with every step
rope fibres and splinters litter the ground
broken glass tinkles in the dust
coarse sand has drifted into knee-high dunes
frost rims the floor and bites through leather
waxy drips have hardened into treacherous lumps
beetle shells and husks crunch like brittle parchment
loose boards flex and complain under your weight
crumbling mortar falls away at each footfall
thin slime stretches in threads between stones
pebbles roll treacherously on a slight incline
seams of metal grating ring beneath your steps
blood-dark stains have dried tacky on the floor
scattered nails snag at hems and boots
thin roots lace the ground like cords
stone dust lies so thick it muffles everything
half-submerged tiles shift beneath cold water
the floor is warm in patches, as if something breathes below
sharp grit bites through the soles with every step
sensesAir: a musty dampness hangs in the air
cold drafts whisper through unseen cracks
stale air fills your lungs
a faint acrid smell burns your nostrils
the scent of decay lingers
dry dusty air catches in your throat
a metallic tang permeates the space
cool air suggests hidden depths nearby
warm humid air presses against you
your torch smoke clings low, refusing to rise
the air tastes faintly of soot and old incense
a sour stench turns your stomach
the smell of wet fur lingers close to the ground
a sickly sweet perfume masks something rotten beneath
ozone pricks your tongue, like after lightning
spores drift in the beam of your light and catch in your throat
the air feels charged, hairs lifting on your arms
brine and seaweed reek as if the place floods at high tide
burnt herbs and pitch hang heavy in your lungs
your breath fogs instantly in the cold
heat blooms in stale pockets, then fades
the air is so dry it cracks your lips
an ammonia sting suggests old urine and neglect
a faint smell of hot metal suggests recent work
mould blooms behind your sinuses with every inhale
the air is thick enough to feel, damp and cloying
pale dust drifts with no breeze, settling on eyelashes
the scent of lamp oil is fresh, recent
charcoal and tallow mingle in the darkness
a medicinal sharpness suggests spirits and bandages
wet stone breathes a cellar-cold chill
a coppery smell hints at old blood
something like rotting fruit sours the air
cold air pours from a crack like an exhale
warm air pushes from below, damp with rot
a faint reek of brimstone curls at the back of your throat
sensesSound: distant dripping echoes
an unnatural silence presses in
faint scratching sounds from the walls
your breath echoes back at you
a low hum vibrates through the stone
whispers seem to dance at the edge of hearing
creaking sounds from above
the soft rustle of unseen movement
water trickles somewhere nearby
water drips in an irregular, maddening rhythm
somewhere, stone grinds on stone with slow patience
tiny chimes tinkle as if touched by a draft
far-off chanting rises and falls, too distant to place
rats squeal and scatter behind the walls
a chain sways and clinks in the dark
your gear seems too loud, every buckle accusing
the faint hiss of escaping steam curls through cracks
loose grit trickles from the ceiling in soft avalanches
an old wheel turns somewhere, creaking once per rotation
something taps from within a pipe, answering your steps
distant footsteps mirror yours, then stop when you stop
a deep thrum pulses like a heartbeat in the stone
flies buzz in a slow, lazy cloud
the flutter of wings erupts, then dies away
wind moans through a narrow slit like a flute
scraping claws circle out of sight
the soft slap of water suggests movement just beyond light
metal ticks as it cools, then snaps
a bell tolls once—then silence, as if it never happened
whispers coil around your ears, too close and too quiet
wood creaks under strain, as if ready to give
muffled sobbing echoes from a side passage
pebbles skitter down a slope somewhere ahead
a distant roar of water suggests a hidden fall
a low, wet gurgle rises from a drain
an intermittent clicking repeats, patient and mechanical
sensesLight: dim light filters from cracks above
absolute darkness swallows everything
phosphorescent fungi cast an eerie glow
your torchlight barely penetrates the gloom
strange shadows dance without source
pale light seeps from the walls themselves
flickering braziers line the walls
a single shaft of light pierces the darkness
bioluminescent lichen traces the ceiling
lantern soot has blackened the ceiling in uneven halos
a dull red glow leaks from hairline cracks
your light is swallowed by a fine mist that drinks the beam
glints of mica flash like eyes in the stone
candles burn in niches, their wicks unnaturally steady
blue witch-light floats near the floor, fading when approached
starlight filters through a shaft, cold and thin
embers smoulder in a firepit that should have gone out
shattered mirrors throw your torchlight into jagged shards
the room is lit from below, as if the floor were coals
a greenish sheen slicks the walls, reflecting faintly
your shadow stretches wrong, bending away from you
light pools in one corner and refuses to spread
thin beams slip through arrow slits in bright knives
pale fungus dots the floor like scattered constellations
a curtain of drifting motes makes the air sparkle
the only light comes from a single glowing rune, dim but constant
a brazier sputters with a smokeless flame
wax-drips have built stalagmites that catch and scatter light
bioluminescent insects crawl in slow trails along the ceiling
a lantern hangs from a hook, swinging slightly though no wind blows
the walls shine with dampness, reflecting your light back at you
a faint shimmer in the air refracts your torch into rainbows
your light seems weaker here, as if drained
golden light leaks from behind a closed door
a pale halo surrounds a broken idol
dust in the air turns your torchbeam into a solid bar
interactions: warm to the touch despite the cold
ringed by a scatter of broken offerings
partly melted, as if once heated white-hot
stitched with cracks that ooze moisture
surrounded by disturbed dust, as if recently moved
bound with tight wire and seals
glazed with a thin film of ice
pinned in place by fallen beams
anchorFeatures: A cracked bell on a timber frame
A long table set with mouldy place-settings
A wall of niches filled with bones
A stone well with a rope still attached
A tilted bookshelf of warped tomes
A bronze brazier packed with ash
A fallen chandelier of chained iron
A tangle of thorny vines forcing its way through masonry
A narrow bridge over a fissure
A hanging net of bones and charms
An idol with its face chiselled away
A slab covered in chalk diagrams
A pulley lift descending into darkness
A barricade of furniture and planks
A stone arch inlaid with metal filigree
A cluster of stalagmites like teeth
A floor mosaic depicting a sunburst
A brazier stand with fresh soot
A chain winch bolted to the wall
A lattice of pipes and valves
A rune-etched doorframe set into bare rock
A wagon with one wheel missing
A shallow trench filled with burnt offerings
An armoured training dummy, split open
A low dais with a scorched centre
A line of ward-stones set into the floor
A pile of broken arrows and fletching
A cold forge with an anvil and tongs
An open sarcophagus with clawed grooves inside
Thick ropes dangling from ceiling hooks

environmentalThreats.name: Cracking Ceiling
environmentalThreats.description: Cracking Ceiling: The ceiling sheds rubble in unpredictable bursts.

environmentalThreats.name: Noxious Fumes
environmentalThreats.description: Noxious Fumes: Toxic vapors choke the room and sting the eyes.

environmentalThreats.name: Tripwire Snare
environmentalThreats.description: Tripwire Snare: Thin cords yank and bind ankles when disturbed.

environmentalThreats.name: Shifting Floor
environmentalThreats.description: Shifting Floor: The stone tilts and slides, threatening to hurl creatures into hazards.

environmentalThreats.name: Runed Conduit
environmentalThreats.description: Runed Conduit: Arcane glyphs pulse, discharging surges across the chamber.

environmentalThreats.name: Collapsing Lintel
environmentalThreats.description: Collapsing Lintel: A cracked arch threatens to drop and block the path.

environmentalThreats.name: Spinning Blades
environmentalThreats.description: Spinning Blades: Hidden gears drive whirling blades along the walls.

environmentalThreats.name: Grasping Vines
environmentalThreats.description: Grasping Vines: Thorny growths lash out to entangle anything that passes.

pressures: The ceiling groans ominously
Cracks spread across the floor
The air grows thin
Strange symbols pulse with light
The walls seem to close in
Noxious fumes seep from vents
Unstable magic crackles
The ground trembles faintly
Shadows move independently
Loose stone threatens to slide under your weight.
A thin crust of floor hides a drop beneath.
Something in the dark reacts to sound, growing restless.
Cold spreads in waves, numbing fingers and slowing breath.
The air carries spores that make your eyes water and vision blur.
A pressure plate sits half-exposed among the rubble.
The walls sweat a slick film that makes grips unreliable.
Faint runes flare whenever you use magic.
A slow leak fills the lowest part of the room with rising water.
The floor tilts toward a drain that gurgles hungrily.
A web of fine threads spans the space at face height.
A heavy door behind you begins to settle shut on its own.
A brittle ceiling beam creaks with each vibration.
Static prickles over your skin as if a storm were trapped indoors.
A swarm of biting insects stirs when your light passes over them.
The room’s echo carries too far, inviting attention.
A low fog conceals hazards at ankle height.
Heat builds near the centre, as if the stone is cooking.
A charm of warding hums, resisting passage beyond a line.
A pile of debris shifts, ready to collapse with one wrong step.
Your light gutters as if something is feeding on it.
A slow pulse in the walls raises your heartbeat to match.
The floor is littered with caltrop-like shards.
A hidden vent exhales scalding air in timed bursts.
The smell of gas grows stronger the deeper you go.
The room’s geometry feels wrong, disorienting distance and direction.
A distant alarm tone begins to repeat, growing louder.

wordToAbility.Archer: Volley: This threat deals half of its damage (rounded up) to 2 targets in Short range.
wordToAbility.Brute: Berserker: Even if this threat is Overwhelmed, it still deals half of its damage (rounded up).
wordToAbility.Skirmisher: Slippery: Any attempt to restrain, pin, or otherwise immobilise this threat requires an additional success.
wordToAbility.Elite: Sword-master: When you Push a Fight roll against this threat while in Touch range, you immediately lose 1d6 Grit.
wordToAbility.Shaman: Conjurer: Instead of dealing damage, this threat can summon an elemental to fight at its side.
wordToAbility.Scout: Ambusher: Unless spotted beforehand by an Effective observational check against this threat's Success Threshold, characters are Surprised when it initiates combat.
wordToAbility.Defender: Shielded: When a check would assign successes to this threat, reduce the assigned successes by 1.
wordToAbility.Lurker: Escape Artist: At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained (pinned, trapped, magically bound, etc.), it escapes.
wordToAbility.Caster: Arcane Defense: Within Short range, magic checks affecting this threat require two additional success to achieve the desired potency.
wordToAbility.Zealot: Heedless: This threat has no Defeat Tier and must be Overwhelmed to be defeated.
wordToAbility.Packleader: Teamwork: This threat immediately deals 1d6 damage to touch range targets that attack a nearby allied threat.
wordToAbility.Sapper: Besiege: Instead of dealing damage, this threat forces open a gate or doorway.
wordToAbility.Harrier: Pursuer: An additional two successes are required to flee from this threat.
wordToAbility.Trapper: Grapple & Pin: Instead of dealing damage, this threat attempts to Pin a creature in Touch range. The target makes an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they are Pinned (can't move or act except in attempts to break free) until they succeed on a Forceful Body check against this threat's Success Threshold at the start of their turn.
wordToAbility.Wrecker: Hurl: Instead of dealing damage in melee, this threat deals its damage to one target up to Far range.
wordToAbility.Regenerator: Regeneration: At the end of each round, remove all accumulated successes from this threat.
wordToAbility.Hypnotist: Hypnotic: At the start of your turn in Short range, make an Effective Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure, you're Stunned until the end of your turn. Once you succeed, you are immune to this ability for the rest of the scene.
wordToAbility.Smotherer: Smother: Instead of dealing damage, this threat smothers all light sources in Short range, until relit.
wordToAbility.Blinker: Teleport Short Range: At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained/anchored, it teleports away up to Short range.
wordToAbility.Riftwalker: Teleport Beyond: At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained/anchored, it teleports away up to Beyond range.
wordToAbility.Wraithkin: Ethereal: Non-magical actions cannot affect this threat unless it is anchored in the physical world. A PC may Anchor it with a suitable Major Impact action (Effective potency) until the end of the next round.
wordToAbility.Stonehide: Stone Skin: Non-magical checks treat this threat's Success Threshold as 5 (even if it is normally lower).
wordToAbility.Meatshield: Meat Shield: If this threat has allies in touch range, the first success dealt against it is dealt to an ally instead.
wordToAbility.Mirrorling: Illusory Doubles: This threat has a number of illusions equal to its success threshold. When targeting this threat, the players roll 1d6. If the number is below the threat's Success Threshold, and has not been rolled already against this threat, they strike an illusion instead.
wordToAbility.Pyrotouched: Flame Aura: When you assign successes to this threat while in Touch range, you lose 1d6 Grit.
wordToAbility.Frosttouched: Ice Immunity: This threat ignores successes dealt with ice.
wordToAbility.Stormtouched: Lightning Immunity: This threat ignores successes dealt with lightning.
wordToAbility.Venomfang: Potent Poison: If a player takes damage from this threat, they are Poisoned. At the end of their turn, they lose 1d6 Grit until they succeed an Effective Body check (Threshold 4) or receive treatment.
wordToAbility.Blightspore: Foul 2: At the start of your turn, while in Short range, make a Competent Mind check against this threat’s Success Threshold; on failure, lose 1 Focus.
wordToAbility.Ritualist: Dark Incantation: Instead of dealing damage, this threat advances a dark ritual. If it isn't Overwhelmed within 3 rounds, the ritual completes and triggers a Devastating/Apocalyptic effect.
wordToAbility.Wordcaster: Power-words: Instead of dealing damage, this threat speaks a Word at a target in Short range. The target makes an Effective Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they suffer a Forceful-tier effect appropriate to the Word (GM call) until the end of their next turn.
wordToAbility.Reassembler: Reassembling: Unless this threat's remains are burned and scattered, it shortly reassembles, all successes removed.
wordToAbility.Dreadlord: Fearsome Presence: At the start of your turn, if within Short range, make an Effective potency Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure, you can't Push your rolls this turn.
wordToAbility.Skypredator: Flying: Cannot be targeted by non-ranged checks unless this threat is grounded. A PC may ground it with a suitable Major Impact action (Effective) until the end of the round.
wordToAbility.Bloodburst: Acidic Blood: When a PC assigns successes to this threat while in Touch range, that PC loses 2 Grit.
wordToAbility.Crusher: Crush: A creature Restrained by this threat (can't move away) loses 2d6 Grit at the start of its turn.

striveAbilities: Acidic Blood: When a PC assigns successes to this threat while in Touch range, that PC loses 2 Grit.
Ambusher: Unless spotted beforehand by an Effective observational check against this threat's Success Threshold, characters are Surprised when it initiates combat.
Armoured (2): This Threat is unaffected by checks and successes less potent than Effective.
Armoured (3): This Threat is unaffected by checks and successes less potent than Forceful.
Anti-magic: Within Short range, magic checks require an additional success to achieve the desired potency.
Arcane Defense: Within Short range, magic checks affecting this threat require two additional success to achieve the desired potency.
Arcanist: Instead of dealing damage, this threat can wield magic to majorly impact the combat at a forceful potency.
Berserker: Even if this threat is Overwhelmed, it still deals half of its damage (rounded up).
Besiege: Instead of dealing damage, this threat forces open a gate or doorway.

Bound: If conjured, the conjurer can command the threat at no focus cost, can use the threat's senses as if they are its own, and can communicate by taking command of it's mouth, even at beyond distance. If the threat is defeated, its conjurer takes 1 damage to their focus. A conjurer can only be bound to one threat at a time.
Conjurer: Instead of dealing damage, this threat can summon an elemental to fight at its side.
Cowardly: If at least 1 success has been assigned against this threat this round, it attempts to flee instead of dealing damage—unless an allied leader or at least 3 other allies are in Short range.
Crew: This Threat deals double successes to other Threats. When the defeat tier is reached, this threat splits into several lesser threats at the end of the round.
Crush: A creature Restrained by this threat (can't move away) loses 2d6 Grit at the start of its turn.
Dark Incantation: Instead of dealing damage, this threat advances a dark ritual. If it isn't Overwhelmed within 3 rounds, the ritual completes and triggers a Devastating/Apocalyptic effect.
Death Wave: When this threat is Defeated (not Overwhelmed), each PC in Touch range loses 1d6 Grit.
Enrage: This threat's damage increases by 1d6 for each round of combat.
Escape Artist: At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained (pinned, trapped, magically bound, etc.), it escapes.

Ethereal: Non-magical actions cannot affect this threat unless it is anchored in the physical world. A PC may Anchor it with a suitable Major Impact action (Effective potency) until the end of the next round.
Fearsome Presence: At the start of your turn, if within Short range, make an Effective potency Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure, you can't Push your rolls this turn.
Fire Immunity: This threat ignores successes dealt with fire.
Fire Vulnerability: Attacking this threat with fire grants an additional success.
Flame Aura: When you assign successes to this threat while in Touch range, you lose 1d6 Grit.
Flaming Breath (2d6): Unless surprised, this threat opens the combat by dealing 2d6 damage against all creatures in Short range, unless they succeed on a relevant check at Effective potency.
Flaming Breath (3d6): Unless surprised, this threat opens the combat by dealing 3d6 damage against all creatures in Short range, unless they succeed on a relevant check at Forceful potency.
Flying: Cannot be targeted by non-ranged checks unless this threat is grounded. A PC may ground it with a suitable Major Impact action (Effective) until the end of the round.
Focus Fire: Instead of dealing damage to multiple targets, this threat deals 3d6 damage to a single target. This can only be used when there are no enemies in touch range of this threat.
Forest's Protection: Checks to Major Impact this threat require two additional success to achieve the desired potency.
Foul: At the start of combat, each PC in Short range makes a Competent Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure, lose 1 Focus.
Foul (2): At the start of your turn, while in Short range, make a Competent Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure, lose 1 Focus.

Grapple & Pin: Instead of dealing damage, this threat attempts to Pin a creature in Touch range. The target makes an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they are Pinned (can't move or act except in attempts to break free) until they succeed on a Forceful Body check against this threat's Success Threshold at the start of their turn.

Grappler: When this threat deals damage to you in Touch range, you become Restrained (can't move away) until the end of your next turn unless you succeed on a Competent Body check against this threat's Success Threshold.

Grappler (2): Instead of dealing damage, this threat attempts to Restrain its target(s). Each target makes a Forceful Body check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they are Restrained (can't move away) until they succeed on an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold at the start of their turn.

Grappler (All): Instead of dealing damage, this threat attempts to Restrain every PC in Touch range. Each target makes an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they are Restrained (can't move away) until they succeed on an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold at the start of their turn.
Group: If this threat is part of a stack of 3 or more threats, it can use all of its non-damaging abilities in addition to dealing half of its damage to each of its targets.
Heedless: This threat has no Defeat Tier and must be Overwhelmed to be defeated.
Horde: This threat can use all of its non-damaging abilities and still deals half of its damage to each of its targets.
Hurl: Instead of dealing damage in melee, this threat deals its damage to one target up to Far range.

Hypnotic: At the start of your turn in Short range, make an Effective Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure, you're Stunned until the end of your turn. Once you succeed, you are immune to this ability for the rest of the scene.
Ice Immunity: This threat ignores successes dealt with ice.
Ice Vulnerability: Attacking this threat with ice grants an additional success.
Ice-bite: Damage from this threat leaves the skin feeling cold and numb for days. If left untreated for several days, it turns into frostbite.

Illusory Doubles: This threat has a number of illusions equal to its success threshold. When targeting this threat, the players roll 1d6. If the number is below the threat's Success Threshold, and has not been rolled already against this threat, they strike an illusion instead.
Indulgent: So long as it isn't disturbed, this threat may let others pass without taking notice.
Lightning Immunity: This threat ignores successes dealt with lightning.
Lightning Vulnerability: Attacking this threat with lightning grants an additional success.
Meat Shield: If this threat has allies in touch range, the first success dealt against it is dealt to an ally instead.
Mental Drain: Whenever a PC within Short range makes a magic check, they lose 1 Focus.
Mind-breaker: This threat deals damage to Focus instead of Grit.
Poisonous: If a player takes damage from this threat, they take another instance of that damage after an hour.
Poisonous (1): If a player takes damage from this threat, they are Poisoned. At the end of their turn, they lose 1 Grit until they succeed a Competent Body check (Threshold 4) or receive treatment.

Potent Poison: If a player takes damage from this threat, they are Poisoned. At the end of their turn, they lose 1d6 Grit until they succeed an Effective Body check (Threshold 4) or receive treatment.

Power-words: Instead of dealing damage, this threat speaks a Word at a target in Short range. The target makes an Effective Mind check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they suffer a Forceful-tier effect appropriate to the Word (GM call) until the end of their next turn.
Pursuer: An additional two successes are required to flee from this threat.
Reassembling: Unless this threat's remains are burned and scattered, it shortly reassembles, all successes removed.
Reflective Hide: When you assign three or more successes to this threat from a single check, you take 1d6 damage to your Grit.
Regeneration: At the end of each round, remove all accumulated successes from this threat.
Regeneration (Numerical): At the end of each round, remove accumulated successes equal to this threat's Success Threshold.
Second Stage: When this threat would be defeated, its second stage is revealed.
Second Stage (Strive): When this threat would be defeated, its second stage is revealed, and each player regains a Strive Die.
Shielded: When a check would assign successes to this threat, reduce the assigned successes by 1.
Slippery: Any attempt to restrain, pin, or otherwise immobilise this threat requires an additional success.
Slow: Defend & Flee checks to escape this threat are set to Competent (1 success), unless the GM rules otherwise.
Smother: Instead of dealing damage, this threat smothers all light sources in Short range, until relit.
Squeeze: A creature Restrained by this threat (can't move away) loses 1d6 Grit at the start of its turn.
Stone Skin: Non-magical checks treat this threat's Success Threshold as 5 (even if it is normally lower).
Suppressing Shot: The first target to push a roll within far range of this threat immediately takes 1d6 damage.
Sword-master: When you Push a Fight roll against this threat while in Touch range, you immediately lose 1d6 Grit.
Teamwork: This threat immediately deals 1d6 damage to touch range targets that attack a nearby allied threat.
Teleport (Short Range): At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained/anchored, it teleports away up to Short range.
Teleport (Beyond): At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained/anchored, it teleports away up to Beyond range.
Volley: This threat deals half of its damage (rounded up) to 2 targets in Short range.
Water Immunity: This threat ignores successes dealt with water.
Water Vulnerability: Attacking this threat with water grants an additional success.
Ambusher: Unless spotted beforehand by an Effective observational check against this threat’s Success Threshold, characters are Surprised when it initiates combat.
Dark Incantation: Instead of dealing damage, this threat advances a dark ritual. If it isn’t Overwhelmed within 3 rounds, the ritual completes and triggers a Devastating/Apocalyptic effect.
Escape Artist: At the end of each round, if this threat isn’t Overwhelmed and isn’t restrained (pinned, trapped, magically bound, etc.), it escapes.
Fearsome Presence: At the start of your turn, if within Short range, make an Effective potency Mind check against this threat’s Success Threshold; on failure, you can’t Push your rolls this turn.
Flaming Breath: Unless surprised, this threat opens the combat by dealing 2d6 damage against all creatures in Short range, unless they succeed on a relevant check at Effective potency.
Flaming Breath: Unless surprised, this threat opens the combat by dealing 3d6 damage against all creatures in Short range, unless they succeed on a relevant check at Forceful potency.
Foul: At the start of combat, each PC in Short range makes a Competent Mind check against this threat’s Success Threshold; on failure, lose 1 Focus.
Foul 2: At the start of your turn, while in Short range, make a Competent Mind check against this threat’s Success Threshold; on failure, lose 1 Focus.

Grappler 2: Instead of dealing damage, this threat attempts to Restrain its target(s). Each target makes a Forceful Body check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they are Restrained (can't move away) until they succeed on an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold at the start of their turn.

Grappler All: Instead of dealing damage, this threat attempts to Restrain every PC in Touch range. Each target makes an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold; on failure they are Restrained (can't move away) until they succeed on an Effective Body check against this threat's Success Threshold at the start of their turn.

Hypnotic: At the start of your turn in Short range, make an Effective Mind check against this threat’s Success Threshold; on failure, you’re Stunned until the end of your turn. Once you succeed, you are immune to this ability for the rest of the scene.
Poisonous 1: If a player takes damage from this threat, they are Poisoned. At the end of their turn, they lose 1 Grit until they succeed a Competent Body check (Threshold 4) or receive treatment.
Regeneration Numerical: At the end of each round, remove accumulated successes equal to this threat’s Success Threshold.
Second Stage Strive: When this threat would be defeated, its second stage is revealed, and each player regains a Strive Die.
Teleport Short Range: At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained/anchored, it teleports away up to Short range.
Teleport Beyond: At the end of each round, if this threat isn't Overwhelmed and isn't restrained/anchored, it teleports away up to Beyond range.

trinkets: Silvered locket with a faded portrait
